title: Bolognese pasta
ingredients: salt, pepper, noodles, water, oil, mushrooms, tomatoes, chicken
description: Known as Bolognese in Italy, these classic slow-simmered sauces are often a Sunday treat at Nonna's house. Our best ever spaghetti bolognese is super easy and a true Italian classic with a meaty, chilli sauce. This recipe comes courtesy of BBC Good Food user Andrew Balmer.

steps.description: We start by boiling the water
We fry the chicken and mushrooms
We add spices according to taste
We mix everything and voila! Enjoy!
